title: Can't Login Into League (NA  Server)
body:
Hey Riot,
I can't login into league for some reason. I tried restarting my computer, uninstalling and reinstalling league, using the repair button and using the hextech repair tool. Nothing is working. The last game i played was an aram which froze mid game saying attempting to reconnect and league closed. Please reply as soon as you can. Thanks

replies.body: Well my brother already fixed the problem but thanks for the help. Its nice to know that riot helps people in a matter of minutes!

When you are attempting to log into league, what error message are you receiving?  It sounds like you may be having a network issue, and not necessarily with your game files.  Let me know, and we can dig into this!
